message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about we meet closer to the middle? This offer is fair and lets us both leave with something.
I'll lower my share a bit, but I still think I deserve the larger portion.
Alice, we're running out of time!  This is my final offer before the value drops significantly.  Let's be smart and take this deal.
